description: I. Letter dated 02/01/2010 from Paul Goggins MP to Prof. Monica McWilliams (Chief Commissioner, Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission) regarding a new women's prison. 2 p. II. Letter dated 06/01/2010 from Paul Goggins MP to Prof. Monica McWilliams regarding a seminar on human trafficking in Northern Ireland. 1 p. III. Letter dated 20/01/2010 from Jonathan Phillips (Permanent Secretary, NIO) to Prof. Monica McWilliams regarding communication between the Northern Ireland Office and the Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission. 1 p. IV. Letter dated 22/01/2010 from Paul Goggins MP to Peter O'Neill (Chief Executive, Northern Ireland Human Rights Commission) regarding the concluding observations of the United Nations Committee on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights. 6 p.
